issue.title: [C++] Update instructions for replicating Windows AppVeyor builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15990](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15990). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
VS2022 has different paths than VS2019 (and VS2019 is not even available for download). And it's no longer necessary to install Boost separately, as far as I can tell? Also the AppVeyor bat seems to assume clcache we should make sure to document how to avoid setting that up.
